text:
Hey gents and ladies, I'm looking for a freelance HubSpot CMS developer who wanna talk to explore opportunities for collab on customer projects.

Say hi at <mailto:benjamin@inlink.se|benjamin@inlink.se> with the subject line: CMS collab :)

Hey everyone, I wanted to share an opportunity for a <https://boards.greenhouse.io/blockrenovation/jobs/4828419003|Growth Engineer in my team>. At <https://www.blockrenovation.com/|Block Renovation> we are aiming to transform the $450 billion renovation industry in US. Recently we've closed round C, next year we'll focus on national expansion and rapid growth in US.  I'm looking for an experienced engineer who understands how marketing and sales work to help us design data backed experiments and build web solutions that support conversion. It is the first GE role in the team and I would like to work with someone who would also help me grow the team of Growth Engineers and build a solid bridge between marketing and engineering teams.
If you have any questions I'm more than happy to answer :slightly_smiling_face:
Best Kris
